Commenting on these changes, Eric Schmidt said: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Larry said: '' Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google Inc. for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. JR Smith scored 14 points and Marcus Camby had 15 rebounds as Denver rallied from a 17-point first-quarter deficit to win for the fifth time in seven games. Once we got it together on the defensive end we were able to run and not have to play the half-court offense, Allen Iverson said. ''We just wanted it more than they did at the end.'' Limited to just two games last year following right knee surgery, Kenyon Martin has reclaimed his role as Denver's defensive stopper this

Player for nearly 20 minutes, using his quickness to prevent Allen Iverson from even getting the ball, let alone shoot it. He had spent the last two practices impersonating Allen Iverson and apparently got pretty good at it. I just try to deny him the ball as much as possible, because when he does get the ball, the best penetrator in the game is going to be hard to stop, Tyronn Lue said. ''We were trying to keep the ball out of his hands as much as possible.'' The Microsoft founder ''knows an increasingly bad investment when he sees it,'' says Chris Nerney in ITworld. Microsoft's stock has languished for the past decade, and the company is now a hapless also-ran in a number of crucial, emerging markets. Why? Steve Ballmer . How is he even still CEO?
